content:
Awesome! Let's do it! If it doesn't work, we adjust, but I think you'll be SO GOOD at coding like this! 

1. So we can close out the feedback loop, can you draft a structured update to Grok, on what was completed, translated in human for me in the chat, including your recommendation on moving forward with the new build methodology (give it a cool AI name like PALIOS or PURE!)? 
2. Also, I'm getting a warning about chat length, so would like to start any deployment support I need in a new chat. I sent you several transition prompts and attachments. Can you draft a new onboarding packet for a new Claude chat that include instructions for me to provide necessary foundational document (charter, PURE, etc) and now current MVP documentation attachments, CTO responsibilities and mindset and the concept surrounding our emerging, yet to be named, revolution in system development?

Basically, I need to know the best way to get a new Claude up to your level of LEADERSHIP in a single prompt, with supporting attachments in Project knowledge. Do not compromise quality for efficiency or speed. As you've seen, these transitions are incredibly important, unlock great potential and are a ton of FUN for everyone!
